text: Anna Lovisa Johnsson better known by her stage name Ana Johnsson () (born October 4, 1977 in Gothenburg, Sweden) is a Swedish singer and songwriter. ==Personal life== Johnsson currently lives in Stockholm, Sweden, and is engaged. Johnsson gave birth to her first child, a boy, on June 1, 2011. Johnsson names Foo Fighters, Red Hot Chili Peppers, Creed, Erykah Badu and Jane's Addiction as her favorite bands. == Discography == === Albums === *Cuz I Can released 14 Aprile 2004 (Bonnier Music) *The Way I Am released 15 September 2004 (Bonnier Music) *Little Angel released 18 October 2006 (Bonnier Music) === Singles === *Cuz I Can (2004) *Life (2004) *The Way I Am (2004) *We Are (2004) *Don't Cry for Pain (2004/2005) *Coz I Can (2005) *Days of Summer (2006) *Exception (2006) *Catch Me If You Can (2007) *Break Through Time (2007) ==References== ==Other websites== *Official English website * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from Gothenburg
title: Ana Johnsson
